author: ruchithf
msg: A security context token can be used to encrypt/sign a msg ... made sure we support that.

author: manolito
msg: Removed site from distributionManagement - each subproject must define the site url explicitly

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: An invalid PDF was created if a grayscale JPEG image with an sRGB profile was embedded undecoded. I didn't find any other way than to disable the the ICC profile in this case.
